original_title: Return of the Bluefin: Hundred Year Bite
overview: Journey South on an 8-day trip onboard the Shogun, for one of the most epic mixes of yellowfin and bluefin action in recent memory. Fishing in U.S. waters, Owner/Operator, Arron Barnhill expertly worked the side scanning sonar and chased the birds to put us on school after school of fish. Packed with great underwater footage and info, this film is sure to get your blood pumping.
title: Return of the Bluefin: Hundred Year Bite
